page.title: 02WALKING AND LEISURE
page.content: We asked 100 households if they belonged to any of the following groups:- Ramblers Association Caravan Club Y.H.A. Friends of the Earth National Trust Holiday Fellowship 1 household belonged to the Ramblers Association & 1 household belonged to the Caravan Club.We asked the questions because these organisations are supposedly popular with people who visit the Lake District.We are only 20 miles away from the National Park. We also asked if families went for walks together.19 families walk in the local area;the Lake District and elsewhere;16 do no walking together;36 walk locally only;20 walk locally and in the Lake District;2 walk in the Lake District and elsewhere;4 walk in the Lake District only;2 walk locally and elsewhere but not in L.D.1 notknow
